name: kentico-cloud-model-generator-utility
description: This utility generates strongly-typed models based on Content Types in a Kentico Cloud project. The models are supposed to be used together with the Kentico Cloud Typescript SDK.
author: richard sustek

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run ts-lint:check && npm run build:all
scripts.test:generate-models: npm run build:commonjs && cd test && node ../_commonjs/src/app --projectId=da5abe9f-fdad-4168-97cd-b3464be2ccb9 --moduleResolution=ES2015 --codeType=typescript --strictPropertyInitalization=true
